bike.description: Reynolds 520 double-butted chromoly main tubes with SST tubing diameters, double-tapered cromo stays, extended head tube with reinforced collars, forged dropouts with double eyelets

components.description: Lugged semi-sloping chromoly with canti bosses, low-rider carrier braze-ons, forged dropout with double eyelets
Alex ACE19 eyeletted double walled rims, 36H, Shimano Tiagra 4500 hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shielding puncture protection, 700 x 32c
Shimano Tiagra RD-4500GS rear and Sora FD-3403 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
FSA Alpha Drive triple with PowerDrive 48/36/26T, 165mm (47) 170mm (50/53/55) 175mm (57/59/62)
Touring platform, full alloy cage & body with toe clips
NVO Components TM-3 adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (47/50), 105mm (53/55), 115mm (57/59/62). ATS shim length 100mm
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 300mm with cromo seat pin
Jamis Touring Sport with pressure relief cut-out and satin steel rails
